examples.description: Search for 2-room apartments in Warszawa with price range 600,000 - 800,000 PLN
Search for 1-room apartments in Śródmieście district with price per sqm up to 30,000 PLN
Search for 2-3 room apartments in any Warszawa district with price range 500,000 - 1,000,000 PLN
Search for apartments in Mokotów district with price per sqm between 15,000 - 25,000 PLN
Search for 1-room apartments with total price up to 600,000 PLN
Search for 3-room apartments in Warszawa with price range 700,000 - 1,500,000 PLN
Search for apartments in Białołęka district with price per sqm up to 20,000 PLN
Search for 2-room apartments in Żoliborz with price range 650,000 - 750,000 PLN
Simple search - just 2-room apartments in Warszawa
Search for apartments in Praga-Północ with price per sqm between 20,000 - 30,000 PLN
COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH - Using ALL available fields: name, price_total, price_per_sqm, rooms, city, and city_district

curl_examples.description: Example 1: 2-room apartments in Warszawa, price 600k-800k PLN
Example 2: 1-room apartments in Śródmieście, price per sqm up to 30k PLN
Example 3: 2-3 room apartments in Warszawa, price 500k-1M PLN
Example 4: Comprehensive search using ALL fields
curl_examples.command: curl -X POST 'http://localhost:8000/filters/search' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"name":"My comprehensive apartment search","price_total":{"min":600000,"max":1000000},"price_per_sqm":{"min":15000,"max":25000},"rooms":[2,3],"city":"Warszawa","city_district":"Warszawa Śródmieście"}'
